• Home (current)
  • Sobre nós
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SearchService } from '../services/search.service'; import { Item } from '../models/itens'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FiltroService } from '../services/filtro.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { public itens: Item[] = []; public filter: FiltroService constructor(public searchService: SearchService, public router: Router,filtro: FiltroService) { this.itens = searchService.itens; filter = filtro; } onInputChanged(event: Event): void { this.searchService.inputValue = (event.target as HTMLInputElement).value; } ngOnInit(): void { this.searchService.searchItens(filter.selectFilter); } searchItens(): void { this.searchService.searchItens('price_asc'); } }
